casebody.data:
Harriet L. HAYES, Appellant, v. AMERICAN SMELTING & REFINING COMPANY, Appellee, and American Electro-Thermic Smelting Corporation, Defendant. No. 396. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 2, 1932. David A. Buckley, Jr., of New York City (Harold G. Aron, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Chadbourne, Stanchfield & Levy, of New York City (C. Frank Reavis, Jr., and'Martin D. Jacobs, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
